original_text: Then the high officials and the satraps sought to find a ground for complaint against Daniel with regard to the kingdom, but they could find no ground for complaint or any fault, because he was faithful, and no error or fault was found in him.
korean_text: 이에 총리들과 고관들이 국사에 대하여 다니엘을 고발할 근거를 찾고자 하였으나 아무 근거, 아무 허물도 찾지 못하였으니 이는 그가 충성되어 아무 그릇됨도 없고 아무 허물도 없음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then the high officials and the satraps
sought to find a ground for complaint against Daniel
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘에 대한 불만 사유를 찾으려고 했다

sentences.original_text: but they could find no ground for complaint
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 불만 사유를 찾을 수 없었고

sentences.original_text: and no error or fault was found in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게서 어떤 실수나 허물도 발견되지 않았다
